mapper.select: select g.id, g.goods_name, g.type_id, g.description, g.imgs, g.count, g.price, g.state, g.brand_id, gb.name brand_name, gt.type_name, SUBSTRING_INDEX(imgs, ',', 1) as url from shop_mall.goods g left join shop_mall.goods_type gt on gt.id = g.type_id left join goods_brand gb on g.brand_id = gb.id where g.id = #{id}

select g.id, g.goods_name, g.type_id, g.description, g.imgs, g.count, g.price, g.state, g.brand_id, gb.name brand_name, gt.type_name, SUBSTRING_INDEX(imgs, ',', 1) as url from shop_mall.goods g left join shop_mall.goods_type gt on gt.id = g.type_id left join goods_brand gb on g.brand_id = gb.id limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into shop_mall.goods(goods_name, type_id, description, imgs, count, price, state, brand_id) values (#{goodsName}, #{typeId}, #{description}, #{imgs}, #{count}, #{price}, #{state}, #{brandId})

type_id = #{typeId},
description = #{description},
imgs = #{imgs},

price = #{price},
state = #{state},
brand_id = #{brandId},
